name: Earthfall
description: NOW AVAILABLE! When the Earth falls to an extra-terrestrial invasion, humanity becomes an endangered species. Earthfall is a four-player cooperative shooter that challenges players to survive hordes of ruthless alien drones and their inscrutable masters.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5-4430 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 750 2GB DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 20 GB available space Additional Notes: SSD Recommended
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i7-4770 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 4GB DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 20 GB available space Additional Notes: SSD
